The user controlled player There may only be one player Created by Calvin on 4/7/2016.

exceedingBoundsBottom

public boolean exceedingBoundsBottom(int frameHeight,
                                     int gravity)
Checks if the player moves gravity amount down it will hit the bottom of the frame

Parameters:
gravity - Will be used to look ahead and see if the player moves gravity amount will it reach the bottom
frameHeight - The height of the main frame that the player is in
Returns:
returns true if it is exceeding the bottom frame bounds false if not

exceedingBoundsLeft

public boolean exceedingBoundsLeft()
Checks to see if the player moves speed amount to the left if it will hit the left bounds

Returns:
returns true if it is exceeding the left frame bounds false if not

exceedingBoundsRight

public boolean exceedingBoundsRight(int frameWidth)
Checks to see if the player moves speed amount to the right if it will hit the right bounds

Parameters:
frameWidth - The width of the current frame the player is in
Returns:
returns true if it is exceeding the right frame bounds false if not
